snippet: A California appeals court on Friday refused to order an Arizona nonprofit group that gave $11 million to two California ballot proposition campaigns to immediately hand over its records.
abstract: California appeals court refuses to order Arizona nonprofit group that gave $11 million to two California ballot proposition campaigns to immediately hand over its records, denying state's political watchdog the chance to discover who financed the donations.
lead_paragraph: A California appeals court on Friday refused to order an Arizona nonprofit group that gave $11 million to two California ballot proposition campaigns to immediately hand over its records.

headline.seo: Donors Remain Secret in California Campaign
headline.main: Donors Remain Secret in California Proposition Campaign
headline.print_headline: California: Cloak Stays Over Secret Donors
